plugin.name: XLSX to JSON Translator
plugin.description: Convert Excel translation files to JSON format
page.home.title: XLSX to JSON Translator
page.home.description: Upload an Excel file with translations to convert them into JSON files. Files will be saved to /public/i18n/[filename]/
field.label: Select Excel File
alert.fileInfo.name: Name
error.invalidFileType: Please upload a valid Excel file (.xlsx or .xls)
error.fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeds the maximum limit of 10MB
instructions.title: Expected Excel Format:
instructions.description: The plugin will create separate JSON files for each language column (en.json, fr.json, etc.) in the /public/i18n/[filename]/ directory.
